sentences.en: Coins are dropped into the top and bounce chaotically off clear spacers on the way down.
sentences.cn: 硬币从储钱罐的顶部投入,乱弹乱跳地到达透明间隔的底部.

sentences.en: Everything breakable had been broken and scattered chaotically about the room.
sentences.cn: 房间里能打碎的东西都打碎了，一片狼藉。

sentences.en: His thoughts churned chaotically in his brain like snowflakes whirling about in the north wind.
sentences.cn: 头脑里,情思弥漫纷乱像个北风飘雪片的天空.

sentences.en: The drugged man was talking chaotically.
sentences.cn: 被药物麻醉的男子语无伦次地说着.

words.tran_cn: 混沌的；混乱的，无秩序的
